title: What's the difference between complementary and alternative medicine?
description: Answer (1 of 7): If a non-mainstream practice is used together with conventional medicine, it's considered "complementary." If a non-mainstream practice is used in place of conventional medicine, it's considered "alternative." Complementary Versus Alternative According to a 2012 national survey...
